name: Into the Castlerooms
description:
Description:

The Castlerooms are a series of rooms and mazes located between reality and the game dimension.

They are supposed to be an urban legend so they are not real... Right?

Controls:

W-A-S-D: Movement

Mouse: Look

E: Interaction

Shift: Sprint

Esc: Pause
